name: hourly-pnl
prompt: Hourly PnL report. Run these 3 commands: 1) `botcore get_paper_portfolio` 2) `botcore get_paper_open_trades` 3) `botcore get_trading_performance`. Create a SHORT summary (under 800 chars) with: balance, equity, hourly PnL, open positions count, win rate. Then send it to Telegram by running `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the summary text.
